title: animalsounds
text: highly optimised function can handle situations animal makes sound: also surprisingly quiet animals:
code: animal_sounds("dog","woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof!" animal_sounds("giraffe") #> [1] "The giraffe makes no sound."

title: Report What Sound An Animal Makes
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(animalsounds) animal_sounds("dog","woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof!" animal_sounds("giraffe") #> [1] "The giraffe makes no sound."
